Desc.entry: Activities include: drama, badminton, sequence and line dancing, art group, ladies group, Women's Institute, conservation society, gardening club, sewing group and local history society. Also hosts Weight Watchers, Slimming World, an annual pantomime, concerts, national meetings of dog show breeds, canary and budgerigar shows. Tumble Tots, Music Tots, breakfast club, after school club, children's dance classes, adult tap classes, occasional "Come Dancing" competitions are also held. Hosts a mobility programme sponsored by the National Osteoporosis Society, Young at Heart, village tea rooms and various Social Services groups which use the centre. Also holds a gala on the last Saturday in June. Access to large kitchen and bar, rooms available for hire. Large car park.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Sun 9-11pm (opening hours); last Wed in the month at 7.30pm (management committee)

category.entry: COMMUNITY CENTRES AND ASSOCIATIONS - POSTAL DISTRICT 35
